title: Can South Africa Transition to Clean Energy?
description: A township’s battle over a new mine shows the challenge of a nation dependent on coal, but also desperate to leave it behind.
dc:creator: Lynsey Chutel, John Eligon and Joao Silva
category: United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change
media:description: A mine overlooking Phola township in Mpumalanga Province, South Africa’s coal region.
